original_text: Our ancestors made an image of a young cow to be their god. They said to each other, “This is our god who brought us out of Egypt.” They insulted you in that way, but you still did not turn away from your people.
korean_text: 또 그들이 자기들을 위하여 송아지를 부어 만들고 이르기를 이는 곧 너희를 인도하여 애굽에서 나오게 한 신이라 하여 하나님을 크게 모독하였사오나

sentences.original_text: Our ancestors made an image of a young cow
"This is our god who brought us out of Egypt."
sentences.korean_translation: "이것이 우리를 이집트에서 인도해 낸 우리의 신이다."

sentences.original_text: They insulted you in that way
but you still did not turn away from your people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 여전히 당신의 백성을 떠나지 않으셨습니다
